title: Morguard North American Residential REIT Declares September 2015 Distribution of 5 Cents per Unit
content:
SOURCE Morguard North American Residential Real Estate Investment Trust

MISSISSAUGA, ON 

About Morguard North American Residential REIT

The REIT is an unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust which owns, through a limited partnership, interests in a portfolio of 14 Canadian residential apartment communities, located in Alberta 

For more information, please visit Morguard.com.
